title: Help me identify this decorative font?
content:
Hi all!

Can anyone help me identify the logo font for [Voga Salon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220739/http:/www.vogasalon.com/) (the black Voga text within the pink oval)? I've been tasked with recreating it as a vector, in all it's glory :). And, as is often the way of the world, they haven't given me all the info. Thanks!

Morgan

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Voga Salon Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220739/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-03%20at%2012.50.16%20PM.png) | 62.52 KB |
author: morganescott

comments.content: Sorry, just realized my screenshot included the InDesign placement circles and it isn't letting me insert an image into my reply. Logo can be viewed [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220739/http:/www.vogasalon.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/logo3.png).
hey! that's in my neighborhood. ish.
